amendment.description: Amendment provides liability protection for on-line service providers who take steps to clean up the Internet, and prohibits the FCC from promulgating content standards for the Internet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 104-223 as amendment No. 2-3, to provide liability protection for on-line service providers who take steps to clean up the Internet, and to bar the FCC from promulgating content standards for the Internet.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 4 (Roll no. 631).
